text: Unió Esportiva Santa Coloma, short UE Santa Coloma, is a football club from Andorra . The club is from Santa Coloma in the parish of Andorra la Vella. They currently plays in Primera Divisió. ==History== UE Santa Coloma was founded on 23 September 1986. In 1996 the club started aa football academy. During few seasons the club was farm team for many Andorran teams including FC Santa Coloma. The first football team was refounded in 2006 by joining the Andorran football league Segona Divisió 2007. The team plays in the Primera Divisió after winning the Segona Divisió in the 2007–08 season. The club made its first matches in European competition in the UEFA Europa League after finishing second in the league in the 2009–10 season. In 2013 the team won his first trophy in the Copa Constitució. 2016 they won the cup versus UE Engordany. One year later they won the cup versus their local rival FC Santa Coloma.Andorran Cup rsssf ==Colours and badge== The club colours are yellow and black. Period * Kitmaker Kit sponsor 2007–12 Joma Escale 2012–18 Joma Seguretat Sepir 2014–18 Luanvi Seguretat Sepir 2018–present Joma None ==Support== The club's nickname is Esquirols (Squirrels) due to the number of the animals that live around the town of Santa Coloma. ==Club rivalries== The local rival of UE Santa Coloma is FC Santa Coloma. ==Honours== * Primera Divisió: ::Runners-up (2): 2009–10, 2013–14 * Copa Constitució: ::Winners (3): 2013, 2016, 2017 ::Runners-up (2): 2010, 2011 * Supercopa Andorrana: ::Winners (1): 2016 ::Runners-up (1): 2013 * Segona Divisió: ::Winners (1): 2007–08 ==League history== Season Division Pos.
